page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Many of the people in Thorpe are {retired}and as there are not many jobs in the area the younger workers {commute}to Lincoln or Newark. The largest form of employment in the area is{farming}as there are six farms in the area including a pig farm. There is a service and repair garage in the village but the main source of jobs in Thorpe itself is the Biscuit Store which has been in the village for just three years.Another form of employment in the village is the school which employs five teachers.
